name: Aftertale [1.1.0]
description:
A Undertale Fan-Made game by Mint, takes place after the genocide run.

Controls Z = Choose! Arrow keys = Move/select

Update log:

v1.0.0: game release

v1.0.1: added more sfx and minor scripting improvement

v1.0.2: added more effect and minor graphic improvement

v1.0.3: added 2 new attack, new attack effects and it looks better now, very major graphic improvement

v1.0.4: bug fix and secret ending added and other smaller stuff

v1.0.5: new attack, the soul blasters.

v1.0.6 adjustment to the knife attacks

v1.0.7: made blasters point at player, knife from the sides now track the player as well

v1.0.8: adjusted the different attack spawn chance 

v1.0.9: added a start screen

v1.1.0: added additions to start screen

Credits to toby fox for the original game

Scripting: Me 

Sprite design: Me

Sounds: Toby fox
